Package com.example.mareu.ui

Class AddMeetingViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.mareu.ui.AddMeetingViewModel
public class AddMeetingViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for adding a new meeting.

    • validateSubject

      public void validateSubject(String subject)
      Validates the meeting subject.
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject to be validated.

    • validateDate

      public void validateDate(Calendar selectedDate)
      Validates the selected meeting date.
      Parameters:
      selectedDate - The selected meeting date to be validated.

    • checkTimeAfterDate

      public void checkTimeAfterDate()
      Checks if the selected meeting time is after the current date and time. Updates the LiveData with the result of the validation.

    • validateTime

      public void validateTime(Calendar selectedTime)
      Validates the selected meeting time.
      Parameters:
      selectedTime - The selected meeting time to be validated.

    • isSameDay

      private boolean isSameDay(Calendar cal1, Calendar cal2)
      Checks if two Calendar objects represent the same day.
      Parameters:
      cal1 - The first Calendar object.
      cal2 - The second Calendar object.
      Returns:
      True if both Calendar objects represent the same day; false otherwise.

    • validateRoom

      public void validateRoom(String selectedRoom, Calendar selectedDate, Calendar selectedTime)
      Validates the selected meeting room's availability based on the selected date and time. Updates the LiveData with the result of the validation and the overall form validation state.
      Parameters:
      selectedRoom - The selected meeting room to be validated.
      selectedDate - The selected meeting date.
      selectedTime - The selected meeting time.

    • isRoomAvailable

      public boolean isRoomAvailable(String selectedRoom, Calendar selectedDate, Calendar selectedTime)
      Checks if the selected meeting room is available for the given date and time, considering existing meetings in the repository.
      Parameters:
      selectedRoom - The selected meeting room to check for availability.
      selectedDate - The selected meeting date.
      selectedTime - The selected meeting time.
      Returns:
      True if the room is available; false if there is a meeting scheduled for the same room, date, and time.

    • validateParticipants

      public void validateParticipants(String email)
      Validates the entered email address for participants, checking if it is a valid email format. Updates the LiveData with the validation result and the overall form validation state. Adds the email to the participant list if valid and not already present.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to be validated and potentially added to the participant list.

    • areEmailsValid

      boolean areEmailsValid(String emails)
      Validates a string containing one or more email addresses by checking if they are in a valid format.
      Parameters:
      emails - The string containing one or more email addresses to be validated.
      Returns:
      True if all email addresses in the input string are in a valid format; false otherwise.

    • addParticipant

      public void addParticipant(String email)
      Adds a new participant email address to the participant list LiveData. If the participant list LiveData is not initialized, it creates a new ArrayList to store the participants. Checks if the email address is not already in the participant list before adding it.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the participant to be added to the list.

    • removeParticipant

      public void removeParticipant(String email)
      Removes a participant email address from the participant list LiveData. Creates a new ArrayList based on the current participant list LiveData, removes the specified email address, and updates the LiveData with the modified list.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the participant to be removed from the list.

    • updateFormValidationState

      public void updateFormValidationState()
      Updates the overall form validation state based on the current validity of individual fields. Checks the validity of the subject, room, date, time, and participants, and sets the LiveData with the resulting overall form validation state.

    • addMeetingToMeetingList

      public void addMeetingToMeetingList(String subjectOfMeeting, String selectedRoom, Calendar selectedDate, Calendar selectedTime, List<String> participantList)
      Adds a new meeting to the meeting list.
      Parameters:
      subjectOfMeeting - The subject of the meeting.
      selectedRoom - The selected meeting room.
      selectedDate - The selected meeting date.
      selectedTime - The selected meeting time.
      participantList - The list of participants.

    • addMeetingToMeetingListViaRepository

      private void addMeetingToMeetingListViaRepository(Meeting newMeeting)
      Adds a meeting to the meeting list via the repository.
      Parameters:
      newMeeting - The new meeting to be added.
